carrier_gateway_id.description: Specifies the ID of the carrier gateway

core_network_arn.description: Provides the ARN of the core network

destination_cidr_block.description: Defines the IPv4 CIDR block for destination

destination_ipv6_cidr_block.description: Specifies the IPv6 CIDR block for destination

destination_prefix_list_id.description: Identifies the prefix list for destination

egress_only_gateway_id.description: ID for the egress-only internet gateway

gateway_id.description: ID of the gateway for route traffic

local_gateway_id.description: ID of the local gateway for routing

nat_gateway_id.description: ID of the NAT gateway for network translation

network_interface_id.description: ID of the network interface for attachment

route_table_id.description: ID of the route table to associate with

timeouts.description: Configures timeout settings for create, delete, update

transit_gateway_id.description: ID of the transit gateway for routing

vpc_endpoint_id.description: ID of the VPC endpoint for connection

vpc_peering_connection_id.description: ID of the VPC peering connection to use
